pageContext.claim: “I really believe that those countries that went into the original [Iran nuclear] deal -- that more and more are agreeing with what I did -- but I think those countries are going to be saying ‘thank you’ someday.”
pageContext.analysis: The other nations in the JCPOA continue to support the agreement. French President Emmanuel Macron has tried to broker a meeting between U.S. and Iranian officials to reach a deal that would prevent further instability in the region.
